name: Time to GOLF
description:
Time to GOLF is a golf climbing game conceived by an author who has never played golf before.

While touching the ground or a wall, simply drag the mouse to launch the ball in that direction.


On your way up the mountain, you will come into contact with various animals and objects.


You will also experience falls that will make you want to throw the mouse.


Created under the influence of Pogostuck: Rage With Your Friends.
